data.title: New Website Launch: Society of Vacuum Coaters
data.text:
The Society of Vacuum Coaters (SVC), a non-profit international professional organization dedicated to coating and surface finishing using vacuum processes, has partnered with Accrisoft to create and launch their next-generation website. In this article, we'll explore SVC's new website's key features, design elements, and functionalities, emphasizing its custom mobile-friendly design.

Table of Contents

Custom Mobile-Friendly Website Features

Featured Web Pages

Intuitive Navigation

Custom Mobile-Friendly Website Features

Quicklinks for High-Value Content: The SVC's new website greets visitors with a user-friendly homepage that provides quick and easy access to high-value content. Quick links on the homepage ensure users can find what they need without unnecessary clicks.

Scrolling Corporate Sponsors and Promotional Partners Section: To highlight their valuable partnerships, the SVC's homepage features a dynamic section showcasing their corporate sponsors and promotional partners. This adds credibility to the organization and provides visibility to these essential contributors.

High-Impact Hero Images: First impressions matter, and the SVC's new website delivers high-impact hero images. These colorful visuals captivate visitors, engaging them from the moment they arrive on the site.

Sidebar Layout for Seamless Exploration: On each subpage of the SVC's website, a well-thought-out sidebar layout encourages users to keep exploring the site without interrupting their browsing experience. This intuitive design enhances user engagement and ensures that valuable information is easily accessible.

Featured Web Pages

Education & Resources: One of the standout features of the SVC's website is its extensive education and resources section. Members can educate themselves and connect with instructors through webinars, enriching their knowledge in vacuum coating and surface finishing.

Longstanding Annual Conference: The SVC's annual conference, svtechcon.com, is a cornerstone of their activities. The website provides a dedicated space to promote this event, making it easy for members and interested parties to access event details, agendas, and registration information.

Publication Overview: To enhance the knowledge-sharing experience, the SVC's website houses a comprehensive publications and digital library. This repository includes conference presentations, talks, glossaries, e-newsletters, media kits, and education guides, making it a valuable resource for members and industry professionals.

Intuitive Navigation

Robust Main Menu: Navigation is a critical aspect of any website, and the SVC's new site offers a robust main navigation menu. It streamlines access to various sections of the website, ensuring that visitors can quickly find the information they seek.

Sticky Navigation: To provide an exceptional user experience, the SVC's website employs sticky navigation, ensuring that essential menu options are always visible as visitors scroll through the pages. This feature simplifies navigation and keeps users engaged.

About Us: The first navigation item takes center stage in the menu, offering visitors a comprehensive overview of the SVC, its board of directors, committees, and other crucial information. This strategic placement ensures that users can easily learn about the organization's mission and structure.

The Society of Vacuum Coaters' partnership with Accrisoft has resulted in a cutting-edge website that is not only mobile-friendly but also feature-rich and easy to navigate. With a focus on high-value content, new design elements, and intuitive navigation, the SVC's new website sets a standard for organizations looking to showcase their capabilities through an exceptional online presence.
